ee anuwa rusiyawe korona wairas aasadithayange sankhyawa 18,328 dakwa ihala yana athara, erata korona marana sankhyawa da 148 dakwa ihala gos thibenawa.me athara, dina 21ka kalayak sandaha wasa dama thibu indiyawe ema nirodhayana samaya heta awasan wimata niyamitha athara, agramathya narendra modi heta udasana 10ta jathiya amatha wishesha prakashayak sidukirimata niyamithayi.ee anuwa bohodurata thawath sathi dekak enam, aprel 30 wana da dakwa indiyawa thawaduratath wasa thabena bawa ohu ehidi prakashayata path karanu athi.
